Header.title: Yarn
Header.paragraph: GM, Welcome to Yarn.Solutions an all in one Decentralized Freelance Platform for Individuals, Projects, and Brands.

About.paragraph: Connect quickly and easily for jobs from artist, devs, friends, founders, influencers, and companies according to your needs or vise versa.
Why: Create and customize a profile for you or your brand
Form a proffesional network to help kickstart your product or project
Apply for jobs, keep track of your gigs and services and leave some feedback on how satisfied you are
Explore a core community of builders, grow your network, and further your career in web3.

Services.name: Web3 Integrations
Services.text: Be both verifiable and anonymous at the same time with Discord and wallet authorization.

Services.name: Networking
Services.text: Connect, network, and chat with hirers, freelancers, founders, friends, colleagues, and companies.

Services.name: Payments
Services.text: both Crypto and Fiat Payment options,

Testimonials.text: " : When I needed some art for my project, I reached out to one of my friends at Galacticats. I was able to connect with reputable and talented artists to get exactly what I needed for a fair price.  It was super easy and reliable.  Two things which are hard to find but absolutely needed in the NFT space."
Testimonials.name: Snowbeard, Admin for Snowskellies NFT

Testimonials.text: " I am very thankful that I got to know the team at Galacticats only a few months after I joined web3 with my company. Since the beginning, we've been working together on various designs and networking with whoever we can! Through them, I was able to make a name for my marketing agency on web3 and doing network with people I never dreamed of doing. Thank you so very much!!! ."
Testimonials.name: Matheus CEO, Atlas Social Media

Testimonials.text: "Through my friends at Galacticats i was able to fill a moderator position for a mfer ."
Testimonials.name: Cardoshi Founder of Dbag Mfers

Features.title: Chat Messaging
Features.text: users can send messages directly to connect with other freelancers, projects or companies.

Features.title: Feedback
Features.text: Leave Feedback on how your experience was for services recieved for other users to see.

Features.title: Custom Packages
Features.text: Post Multiple style gigs at once for different size jobs weather its a standard, medium, or premium package.

Features.title: Profile Customization
Features.text: Customize your Profile, set your Bio, change your pfp, input links or other information .
